text: Dallas McIlwain (born 24 January 1982 ) is an Australian former professional rugby league footballer who played in the 2000s for Canterbury-Bankstown in the National Rugby League competition. McIlwain's position of choice was at lock-forward. ==Background== McIlwain was born in Inverell, New South Wales, Australia. ==Playing career== McIlwain made his first grade debut for Canterbury in 2005 and played 2 seasons with the club, however during the 2007 season McIlwain suffered a back injury. The injury would eventually force him to leave Canterbury and return to Queensland. In 2008, McIlwain joined Wynnum- Manly in the QLD Cup competition. ==References== ==External links== *Official Dallas McIlwain NRL profile Category:1982 births Category:Australian rugby league players Category:Canterbury-Bankstown Bulldogs players Category:Rugby league second-rows Category:Rugby league centres Category:Rugby league locks Category:Living people Category:Rugby league players from New South Wales
title: Dallas McIlwain
